name: TrueDetective
description:
TrueDetective is a story based rpg, in which you have to solve a murder as a detective. You will find hints by questioning the villagers and exploring the surroundings.The inhabitants are very dishonest, so they will almost always serve you with a lie, which of course you reveal as a great detective. but watch out! your time is running out

We unfortunately weren´t able to get this game to a satisfactory state. But it at least shows the charm and idea, behind it. 

It is a buggy mess.. :( Our planned scope was way too big for 2 people and especially for our first game jam.

Made by 2 (1 Programmer and 1 Graphic designer)

Alexander 'eclipse' Karsten as Programmer/Writer

Silas Hammen as Designer/Writer
